name: ventMode_setValue
description: This function is used to set the ventilation mode of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the ventilation mode.

parameters.name: predefinedVentMode
parameters.description: The predefined mode to set for the ventilation (e.g., automatic, bypass, heat transfer, sleep).
